ModuleDescription: The course is designed for individuals who want to improve their visual communication skills and stimulate creative thinking. Through hands-on practice, students are taught how to use the stylus and tablet to create sketches and paintings in Photoshop. Major topics include: Dynamic sketching; Introduction to stylus, tablet and Photoshop; Understanding and applying values and light; Rendering with colour; Silhouetting for ideation; Layout for presentation. Students are expected to do weekly assignments and apply what they have learnt in two main projects.
